text: The Calgary Hitmen are a Canadian professional ice hockey team that began playing in 1995. They currently play in the Western Hockey League. They play their home games in Calgary, Alberta at the Scotiabank Saddledome. The teams name pays homage to the nickname of retired professional wrestler Bret Hart. Hart was also a founding member of the Hitmen along with NHL players Theoren Fleury and Joe Sakic.http://brethart.com/bio/columns/calgary-hitmen The team has won 2 Ed Chynoweth Cups. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1995 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in Alberta Category:Western Hockey League Category:Sports teams in Calgary
title: Calgary Hitmen
